name: Peers.net
description: Peers.net is a mental health service designed specifically with and for teens and young adults (age 13-30). On the telehealth platform you can get 1:1 confidential and non-judgmental support via chat, audio or video from someone who actually understands what it means to struggle with your mental wellbeing, because they’ve been through it themselves
